00015 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00016         [super forwardInvocation:anInvocation];

00020 -(id)play {
00021         id value = super.play;
00022         if ([value isKindOfClass:[UIRedoer class]]) {
00023                 if ([[value target] respondsToSelector:@selector(setRedoer:)]) {
00024                         [[value target] setRedoer:self];
00025                 }
00026         }
00027         return value;
00028 }
00029 
00030 -(id)redo {
00031         [target performSelector:@selector(redo)];
00032         return self;
00033 }
00034 
00035 @end
